text.sentence: I wish I could take credit for the link success but none of the things I was trying were what actually did it.
Seems that if you copy from Netscape and paste into this e-mail system it happens automatically.
Now this one is actually the result of extra geek effort on my part: BVI Weather.
I'm leaving for a conference here in Houston now and may not be back in the office before leaving for NY.
I'll have my computer with me but am notorious for being incapable of accessing my e-mail on the road so telephone is probably the safest way to reach me from here on.
I check messages at the office fairly often.
(713)853-7459 (office) (713)863-7190 (home) (281)367-1100 (Woodlands Resort & Conference Center - tonight) (212)355-3000 (Waldorf - arriving Saturday afternoon)
